thread.title: Tim Lonas

author: Tim Lonas
title: Tim Lonas
text: I didn't have a clue what steps to take and Jessie helped me so much. She walked me through the steps and so far, even though I made a mistake in getting my first dui ever. She didn't make me feel bad and made everything so simple. Thank you for making something I have dreaded for months so simple. Great customer service!! Thanks to automaxx in Knoxville tn also for guiding me to intoxalock!! I highly recommend both places!!
